Text: Hey would u have the stactis version same author and same edition
Amazing : D thanks a lot I was about to buy this since no one had uploaded it so far :)
Why is the book missing first 12 chapters??? this was a waste
This rocks! Any chance of getting the solution manual? That would help so much

This is just dynamics, the first 12 chapters are the separate statics textbook of which there is no pdf.

To my knowledge this is the only copy of the dynamics textbook and there is no solution manual to date.
